author: Oliver Knight
title: How James Wynn's $100M Implosion Is Familiar Leverage Tale
description: The trader suffered a nine-figure loss despite bitcoin remaining fairly flat in terms of price action.
content: Derivatives trader James Wynn emerged out of the woodworks a few weeks ago, flaunting 9-figure bitcoin positions on HyperLiquid as he went on a seemingly undefeatable run that culminated in around $1… [+3649 chars]
